Posts.Content: KarYar89 wrote: About 8 months ago I had pain on my nipple. I squeezed it and I had a white cheesy discharge come out. Like when you pop a cyst. For two days it kept coming out when I squeezed just like a cyst. I had a breast exam and an ultrasound that all came back clear. 4 months later I felt pain again I squeezed and less came out and only that time. I don’t know why I squeezed yesterday and a tiny itty bit came out. The discharge is white, thick, and strongly resembles a cyst or pimple discharge. I am constantly checking for bumps and don’t feel anything. I’m still worried it can be cancer that’s starting on the nipple. It only comes out from one breast, only when squeezed, but not every time it’s squeezed, there a no crust on nipple or anything. I also hd blood exam and that came back back good. What should I’m still worried i Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: White Cheesy Discharge KarYar89 Moderators
